item.title: CVE-2024-24781|2024-02-13T13:48:23.959Z -- HIMA -- F30 03X YY (COM)
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can use an uncontrolled resource consumption vulnerability to DoS the affected devices through excessive traffic on a single ethernet port.Â

item.title: CVE-2024-24782|2024-02-13T13:47:58.187Z -- HIMA -- F30 03X YY (COM)
item.description: An unauthenticated attacker can send a ping request from one network to another through an error in the origin verification even though the ports are separated by VLAN.
